Class WalletFactory

  • java.lang.Object

public class WalletFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for Wallet implementation v2. This is beta version

                        int retryCount,
                        long retryInterval)
        Create a wallet instance.
        Parameters:
        keyStore - an keystore instance
        retryCount - a retry count on nonce failure
        retryInterval - a retry interval in milliseconds on nonce failure
